title: How to write a book report - Quora

response.answer_text: It is easy, get on a notebook or a computer and write it:Here are some detailed explanations:go on the notebook and write a first then b-o-o-k, then r-e-p-o-r-tNow if you do it on computer, press key a, then key b, then key o, two times, then key k, then key r, then key e, then key p, then key o, then key r, then key t.There you go, you wrote a book report:

Read the book. Seriously, that’s what you are supposed to do. Then write about what you thought of it. Think of it as a review you are writing about the book for a newspaper or your website. Why did you like/hate it? Cite the particular passage that really cemented your view. Was it easy/hard to read? Why?
